SEARCH
Package ie.atu.sw

Class ProcessFiles

java.lang.Object
ie.atu.sw.ProcessFiles
public class ProcessFiles extends Object
This class Processes all files which the user has inputed from the runner class. This class has a Integer List, Two ConcurrentSkiplistSets, One called index which holds all the eBook words One called ignore which holds all the words the program is going to ignore
Author:
Rohan Sikder
